Name: Web graphs
Description: nodes represent webpages and edges are hyperlinks

Name: Online communities
Features: Images, Reddit Embeddings, Reddit requests, Reddit submissions, Subreddit hyperlinks
Description: data from online communities such as Reddit and Flickr

Name: Online reviews
Features: Amazon reviews (all categories), Beer reviews, Food reviews, Movie reviews, Wine reviews
Description: data from online review systems such as BeerAdvocate and Amazon

Name: Citation networks
Description: nodes represent papers, edges represent citation

Name: Face-to-face communication networks
Description: networks of face-to-face (non-online) interactions

Name: Graph classification datasets
Description: disjoint graphs from different classes

Name: Internet peer-to-peer networks
Description: nodes represent computers and edges communication

Name: Temporal networks
Features: Attributed, Bipartite, Directed, Signed, Temporal, Weighted
Description: networks where edges have timestamps

Name: Wikipedia networks, articles, and metadata
Features: Bipartite, Directed, Edits, Navigation paths, Signed, Wiki markup, undirected
Description: talk, editing, voting, and article data from Wikipedia

Name: Location-based online social networks
Description: social networks with geographic check-ins

Name: Amazon Product Co-purchasing networks
Description: nodes represent products and edges link commonly co-purchased products

Name: Social networks
Features: Attributed, Bipartite, Directed, Signed, Temporal, Weighted, undirected
Description: online social networks, edges represent interactions between people

Name: Road networks
Description: nodes represent intersections and edges roads connecting the intersections

Name: User actions
Description: actions of users on social platforms.

Name: Communication networks
Description: email communication networks with edges representing communication

Name: Autonomous systems
Description: graphs of the internet

Name: Collaboration networks
Description: nodes represent scientists, edges represent collaborations (co-authoring a paper)

Name: Computer Communication Networks
Description: communications among computers running distributed applications

Name: Signed networks
Features: Attributed, Bipartite, Directed, Signed, Temporal, Weighted
Description: networks with positive and negative edges (friend/foe, trust/distrust)

Name: Twitter and Memetracker
Description: memetracker phrases, links and 467 million Tweets

Name: Networks with ground-truth communities
Description: : ground-truth network communities in social and information networks
